mapper.select:
select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description,m.fnumber as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber,m.flevel,m.FPartCostCenterID as costCenterId,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,c.FISBIZUNIT as isSTCost from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter c on c.fid=m.FPartCostCenterID
and m.fid=#{id}
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and m.fid in (select fid from T_ORG_Company)
order by m.FLONGNUMBER
select FIsBizUnit as unit from T_ORG_Company where fid=#{id}
select fisbizunit as unit from T_ORG_CostCenter where fid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber,m.FLEVEL, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,cc.FCOSTCENTERTYPE as costCenterType,cc.FISBIZUNIT as isBizUnit from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter cc on cc.fid=m.FPARTCOSTCENTERID
m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and cc.FISBIZUNIT=1
and m.FID in
#{item}
order by m.flongnumber

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID
m.FIsOUSealUp=0 -- and fi.FISBIZUNIT=1 -- and not exists (select m1.fid from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m1 where m1.FPARENTID=m.fid)
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
and m.FLONGNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{longNumber}),'%')
and fi.FISBIZUNIT =#{isCompany}
order by m.FLONGNUMBER

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID
m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and exists (select fi.fid from T_ORG_OUPartFI fi where fi.fid=m.FPartFIID) and m.FPARENTID=#{id} and fi.FISBIZUNIT=1
order by m.flongnumber

select fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.fid as id,m.FPARENTID as parentId,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID where m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and m.FISLEAF=0 and m.fid=#{parentId} and fi.FISBIZUNIT is not null order by m.flongnumber
select distinct FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT where FLEVEL>0 order by FLEVEL

select fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.fid as id,m.FPARENTID as parentId,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID where m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and m.FISLEAF=0 and m.FLEVEL=1 and fi.FISBIZUNIT is not null order by m.FNUMBER

select fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.fid as id,m.FPARENTID as parentId,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID where m.FIsOUSealUp=0 and m.FISLEAF=0 and m.FPARENTID=#{id} and fi.FISBIZUNIT is not null

select fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany, m.fid as id, m.FPARENTID as parentId, m.FNAME_L2 as title, m.FNUMBER as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName, m.FISLEAF as isLeaf, m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany, m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID = m.FPARTFIID
m.FIsOUSealUp = 0 and m.FISLEAF = 0 and fi.FISBIZUNIT = 1
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
order by m.flongnumber

select m.fid as id, m.FNAME_L2 as title, m.FNUMBER as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FLEVEL, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName, m.FPARENTID as parentId, cc.FCOSTCENTERTYPE as costCenterType, cc.FISBIZUNIT as isSTCost from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter cc on cc.fid = m.FPARTCOSTCENTERID
m.FIsOUSealUp = 0 and cc.FISBIZUNIT=1
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.FNUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
order by m.FLONGNUMBER

select m.fid as id, m.FNAME_L2 as title, m.FNUMBER as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FLEVEL, m.FPARENTID as parentId, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName, cc.FCOSTCENTERTYPE as costCenterType, cc.FISBIZUNIT as isSTCost from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter cc on cc.fid = m.FPARTCOSTCENTERID where m.FIsOUSealUp = 0 and cc.FISBIZUNIT is not null and m.fid=#{parentId}

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FNUMBER as num,m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description, fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,m.FLEVEL from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID where m.fid=#{id} order by m.FLONGNUMBER

select m.fid as id,m.FNAME_L2 as title,m.FDESCRIPTION_L2 as description,m.fnumber as num, m.FLONGNUMBER as longNumber,m.flevel,m.FPartCostCenterID as costCenterId,m.FISLEAF as isLeaf, m.FSIMPLENAME as simpleName,fi.FISBIZUNIT as isCompany,c.FISBIZUNIT as isSTCost from T_ORG_BASEUNIT m left join T_ORG_OUPartFI fi on fi.FID=m.FPARTFIID left join T_ORG_OUPartCostCenter c on c.fid=m.FPartCostCenterID
m.FISLEAF=1 and m.FIsOUSealUp = 0
and m.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and m.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
order by m.FLONGNUMBER
